8ac11b5a-2bb6-4ecb-88e2-6fd4428121a5.name: 健康
8ac11b5a-2bb6-4ecb-88e2-6fd4428121a5.notes: +1 to all HT rolls to stay conscious, avoid death, resist disease, resist poison; recover FP at twice the normal rate (but not FP spent for spells or psi powers)

b6044137-1f23-49fc-9e17-64d8af2fd28c.name: Fit, Very
b6044137-1f23-49fc-9e17-64d8af2fd28c.notes: +2 to all HT rolls to stay conscious, avoid death, resist disease, resist poison; recover FP at twice the normal rate; lose FP at half the normal rate (in both cases, not FP spent for spells or psi powers)

353381e8-b6b6-440d-aa9a-27ddfd4a58be.name: 幸运
353381e8-b6b6-440d-aa9a-27ddfd4a58be.notes: 游戏的每个小时可用一次

cc26e009-8a8e-4d46-9da0-09e610b7ce2e.name: Luck, Extraordinary
cc26e009-8a8e-4d46-9da0-09e610b7ce2e.notes: 每三十分钟游戏可以用一次

373ea435-c212-406b-8d28-f35bd664865c.name: Weapon Bond
373ea435-c212-406b-8d28-f35bd664865c.notes: You own a Weapon that is uniquely suited to you.

5ab2d29d-c1d9-472b-8838-9797154c7b50.name: 战斗反射
5ab2d29d-c1d9-472b-8838-9797154c7b50.notes: Never freeze; +6 on all IQ rolls to wake up or to recover from surprise or mental stun; Your side gets +1 to initiative rolls (+2 if you're the leader)

01ce1422-6000-4aab-a9ac-ec59a40aba41.name: 高痛阈
01ce1422-6000-4aab-a9ac-ec59a40aba41.notes: Never suffer shock penalties when injured; +3 on all HT rolls to avoid knockdown and stunning; +3 to resist torture

bd252fff-9c91-45ad-b867-4f7c9ef1cc6c.name: 执念
bd252fff-9c91-45ad-b867-4f7c9ef1cc6c.notes: Choose a type of monster to slay

159007dd-9243-4e05-a463-e41ce6d3d4f3.name: Vow (Never refuse a challenge to combat)

3645f604-afe3-4ceb-8785-491cf6e4145c.notes: May get stuck on spike thrust; see Picks (p. B405).

902b7909-bdf4-4999-ba22-0cb33946be34.text: For the Knight Loadout, pick one from Light Warrior, Medium Warrior and Heavy Warrior, then pick one weapons package.  Many loadout combinations require Signature Gear or points traded for money, see DF13:19 for more information.
